full_summary:
Office Furniture Tender Announcement
=====================================

Government of Canada Solicitation
-------------------------------

* Reference number: [WS4236272488-Doc4236313313](#)
* Amendment number: 2
* Solicitation number: [WS4236272488](#)

Publication and Closing Information
-----------------------------------

* Publication date: [2023-09-29](#)
* Tender closing date: [2023-10-16 14:00:00 EDT](#)

Introduction
------------

The Government of Canada invites tenders for the supply of office furniture, specifically chairs and office furniture installation or reconfiguration services, for the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

Bidder Requirements and Guidelines
----------------------------------

* The procurement method is competitive and selective tendering.
* The selection criteria is based on the lowest price.
* A request for proposal (RFP) is announced.

Contract and Service Information
-------------------------------

* Expected contract start date: [2023-10-31](#)
* Expected contract end date: [2024-05-31](#)
* Tender status: Cancelled (Note: The cancellation of the tender has been announced.)

Important Information
-------------------

* The contact information for the procurement officer is:
	+ Jessica Canas (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Revisions and Modifications
---------------------------

* Amendment to closing time: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on October 16, 2023, before 14:00:00 HAE.

Please note that the invitation to bid has been announced in both English and French. Bidder should ensure that the bid is submitted in a suitable language or simultaneously in both languages. We encourage you to regularly check with the Point of Contact for any update on this procurement project.

Contact Information
-----------------

Jessica Canas,
Commercial Acquisition Specialist,
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC),
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5,
[jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Disclaimer
----------

This tender announcement is subject to the terms
